answers.answer: STAY AT HOME AND WATCH A NEW NETFLIX SERIES THAT YOU’VE WANTED TO BINGE FOR AGES
GET YOUR DANCING SHOES ON, YOU’RE OFF TO A GIG WITH YOUR MATES
ROAD TRIP TO A FESTIVAL WITH LOADS OF FRIENDS, READY FOR A WILD WEEKEND WITH NON-STOP MUSIC
AN EVENING AT AN INTIMATE ACOUSTIC GIG WITH DINNER AND SOPHISTICATED DRINKS AFTERWARDS
SUN-BATHE AROUND THE POOL, COCKTAIL IN HAND, HAVE A BOOK ON THE GO AND PLENTY OF SNACKS AT HAND
BE UP EARLY ON YOUR HOLIDAY, OUT TO SEE THE SITES AND MAYBE A BIT OF WATER SPORTS IN THE AFTERNOON? QUICK CHANGE AND OFF TO THE LOCAL BARS!
BE THE LIFE AND SOUL OF THE PARTY
BE CALM, COLLECTED AND ALWAYS RELIABLE
